title: Sri Lanka Treasuries yields drop, 3-month down 86bp
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s Treasury bill yields dropped across maturities at Wednesdays auction with the 3-month yield down 86 basis points, data from the state debt office showed.
The debt office sold 40 billion rupees of 3-month bills after offering 40 billion.
The 6-month bill fell 71 basis points to 22.89 percent with 12.8 billion rupees of bills sold after offering 30 billion.
The 12-month yield fell 62 basis points with 28 billion rupees of bills sold.
The debt office sold all offered 98 billion rupees of bills. (Colombo/June08/2022)
